title: ClickShop
description: Ecommerce Website built using React and Spring Boot.
ClickToShop is an e-commerce platform that seamlessly integrates React for the front-end and Spring Boot for the robust backend with MySQL.
Designed to deliver a streamlined shopping experience.
Offers a range of features catering to the modern online consumer.

title: Watch Out Weather
description: Flutter weather application fetching real-time data from a weather API.
Displays weather information in a clean and intuitive interface.
Allows users to quickly access weather details for their location.
Enables search for weather in other cities.

title: ComTrack
description: Slot Management application developed using Node.js and MS SQL database.
Prevents overbooking and ensures efficient scheduling.
Built with Angular, ExpressJS, and Microsoft SQL database.
Site management.
Study management.
Slot booking with verification to prevent overlapping slots.
Allocation of slots to patients based on site admin approval.
Rescheduling and cloning of slots.

title: Harbor App
description: Recruitment Management System for Marine Industry.
Platform for providing or seeking jobs within the marine industry.
Password-less login (OTP verification, Google, Apple).
Chat functionality.
Notification functionality.
Ratings and reviews with reward system.
Stripe payment gateway integration with transaction history.
